name: G2 Systems
overview: G2 Systems provides programming, integration and customization services for hedge funds, brokerage firms and Fund administrators. Additionally, G2 provides staffing and outsourcing solutions for front, mid and back office systems.

milestones.description: G2 Named by Advent Software into Alliance Partners Program
milestones.source_text:
BOSTON & NEW YORK -- (BUSINESSWIRE) -- G2 Systems LLC, an innovative software consulting firm specializing in portfolio management/accounting systems, today announced that it has been named by Advent Software, Inc. (NASDAQ: ADVS) to its Alliance Partner Program. Advent is a leading provider of software and services to the global investment management industry.

Adventâ€™s Alliance Partners offer integration to products that complement and enhance the core capabilities of Adventâ€™s industry-leading solutions. G2 Systems will offer Adventâ€™s GenevaÂ® clients the use of â€˜TaxGopherâ€™, a powerful tax analysis tool that delivers an automated tax reporting solution for all trading activities. â€˜TaxGopherâ€™ creates reports on the tax implications for wash sales, constructive sales, qualified dividends and other tax-related events. GenevaÂ® is Adventâ€™s award-winning portfolio management and fund accounting solution.

â€œDue to complex tax rules, fund accounting can be very challenging,â€ said George Michaels, Co-Principal of G2 Systems, LLC. â€œTaxGopher simplifies the process and helps to manage costs by keying in on tax events such as wash sales and informs you of the tax implications of those events and others. The reports generated provide key information so brokerage firms or hedge funds can make the best trading decisions possible.â€

â€œWe are very pleased to name G2 Systems an Alliance Partner for GenevaÂ®,â€ said Todd Gottula, Senior Vice President and General Manager of Global Accounts at Advent. â€œG2 Systems has proven their expertise in delivering GenevaÂ®-related services to dozens of major investment firms.â€

G2 Systemsâ€™ unique software is highly configurable and is built upon the G2 Data Warehouse but it can also use other middle or back-office applications as its data source. It has an easy to use GUI with simple input requirements to ease data integration with a userâ€™s general ledger or OMS (order management software). Additionally, it can sit on your PC or on any application server, and it fits with any hardware infrastructure.

About G2 Systems

G2 is a boutique technology consulting firm that provides programming, integration and customization expertise to hedge funds, brokerage firms and fund administrators. G2â€™s team is comprised of proven industry insiders who are well-versed in both the financial and engineering areas. G2 Systemsâ€™ trading and IT experience comes from both multi-billion dollar hedge funds and proprietary investment departments of major brokerage houses. G2 clients include more than two dozen hedge funds and many of Wall Streetâ€™s largest prime brokerages.

G2 knows the ins and outs of front-to-back-office activities. G2 Systems operates coast to coast with a staff of 25. Please visit G2 Systems LLC at www.g2systemsllc.com.

About GenevaÂ®

GenevaÂ®, a global investment management and accounting platform, is a proven solution for asset managers, hedge funds, fund administrators, prime brokers, and mutual funds that require a high level of operational efficiency and easy access to real time data. GenevaÂ® offers comprehensive instrument coverage, full financial general ledger, and industry-standard integration tools to enable firms to manage complex investment vehicles, multiple investment strategies, and tiered fund structures. For more information on GenevaÂ® visit https://secure.advent.com/info/pr_geneva.

About Advent

Advent Software, Inc., a global firm, has provided trusted solutions to the worldâ€™s financial professionals since 1983. Today firms in 60 countries rely on Advent technology to run their mission-critical operations. Adventâ€™s quality software, data, services and tools enable financial professionals to improve service and communication to their clients, allowing them to grow their business while controlling costs. Advent is the only financial services software company to be awarded the Service Capability and Performance certification for being a world-class support and services organization. For more information on Advent products visit http://www.advent.com/about/resources/demos/pr.
